name: Steel Shell
description:
Steel Shell - This is a third-person shooter, in the style of dark cyberpunk. There is no linear plot, quests, and pumping. Just grab the first cannon you see and scrap those damn droids! You are provided with a whole mountain of firearms (pistols, assault and sniper rifles, shotguns, grenades and so on), a melee system and four arenas captured by evil robots so that you can use all this arsenal.

Features


  • Responsive character control model
  • Spectacular combat system
  • Diverse AI
  • Atmospheric locations
  • Lots of electronic music
